article_title: Katy Perry, Corn Dogs Heavily Featured In This Week’s College GameDay Signs At LSU
article_text:
Matt Lombardi

Matt is a Co-Founder at College Spun. He can be reached at [email protected]

article_metadata.description: Well, we should have seen this coming. A few weeks back, pop superstar Katy Perry took a shot at LSU fans for smelling like corn dogs when she was the celebrity guest picker on ESPN's College GameDay.
